full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RIGS LAM GSAL BAR PHYE BA'I MTHA' DPYOD NGO MTSAR DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @047B (RANG CAG RNAMS KYI LHA CIG SKU 'PHRENG BRGYAD PA SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PAS BSTAN PA, NGO MTSAR RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I SGO NAS DANG ZHING RGYAS ZHES BKA' STZAL BA DANG, SNGON BYON DAM PA DU MAS KYANG KHU RI CHEN MOR MA 'ON PA NA BSTAN PA NGO MTSAR RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I SGO NAS DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR LUNG BSTAN PA DANG YANG DUS MTHUN, SKU 'PHRENG BRGYAD PA DANG PO BYON PA NAS DA LTA LO BCU DGU'I PAR DU BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PA'I NGO MTSAR RTAGS MANG DU BYUNG BAS DGE 'DUN RNAMS KYIS NGO MTSAR DGA' BA RGYAS PA'I DUS 'DIR, RIGS LAM GSAL BAR PHYE BA'I MTHA' DPYOD NGO MTSAR DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BLO GSAR SKAL LDAN DU MAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,DKA' BCU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA 'KHOR BCAS MNYES PA'I MCHOD PA RGYAS PAR SPROS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA PHYOGS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE BA 'DI YIS MYUR DU BDAG ZHING MCHOG SHAMBHA LAR SKYES NAS, ,BLA MA LHA YIS RJES BZUNG STE, ,TSE GCIG SANGS RGYAS MYUR THOB SHOG ,CES DKA' BCU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SMON LAM BTAB PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
